name: NonPestisYersiniosisInfectionTestsForYersiniaNonPestisSpeciesNucleicAcid
title: Non pestis Yersiniosis Infection (Tests for Yersinia non pestis species Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Yersinia non pestis species Nucleic Acid.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: yersiniosis|Yersinia enterocolitica|Yersinia pseudotuberculosis|Yersinia),(Exclusion Criteria: pestis)
